attributes.action: Investigate levels of toxic chemicals in "squishies" toys and ban if unsafe.
attributes.background: The Danish government has recently withdrawn a number of squishy toys or "squishies" from sale after finding toxic chemicals, such as DMF, were present. We call on the UK government to initiate tests and take action if levels of toxic chemicals are found to be unsafe.

rejection.details:
It’s about something that the UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.


We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. You can find more information about making a report to Trading Standards here: 

https://www.citizensadvice.org.uk/consumer/get-more-help/report-to-trading-standards/
